info.title: Kitchen and foods
info.description: A project made in NODEjs and EXPRESS about kitchen and food, only admin users can add, delete and edit meals. Other type of users can buy and see any kind of meal in the menu, every food have a category.

tags.name: Bill
tags.Description: Everything about bills when the user buy something.

tags.name: Food-Category
tags.Description: Everything about food-category, just admin users que add and see categories.

tags.name: Client
tags.Description: Everything about client, just admin users que add, see and delete clients.

tags.name: Ingredient
tags.Description: Everything about ingredients, just admin users que add, see and delete ingredients.

tags.name: Food
tags.Description: Everything about foods, just admin users que add, see and delete ingredients.

tags.name: Authentication
tags.Description: Everything about authentication, The users have to enter their email and password and it will send a token to add in the header.

get.description: End-point to retrieve all the suggestion from the database.

200.description: When the user have the right token and enough permission to make the request.

suggestion.example: la comida estaba muy buena pero el atun quedo un poco salado

400.description: When the user did not enter the right token.

403.description: If the user is authenticated in the application but does not have the permissions to make this request.

schema.example: You do not have enouth permission to make this request

post.description: Add a suggestion to the kitchen

200.description: When the user have the right token and enough permission to make the request.

400.description: When the user did not enter the right token, or add another field that do not have to enter.
